Source code for maxaifeaturization.featuretools.featuretools

import featuretools as ft
from woodwork.logical_types import Categorical, Integer, Double, Datetime
import pandas as pd
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")
        

[docs]class FeatureToolFeatures:
    """The constructor for FeatureToolFeatures class.

    Args:
        spark (pyspark.sql.SparkSession): _description_
        logger (logging.getLogger, optional): The logger object for logging execution flow. Defaults to None.
    """
    def __init__(self, spark, logger=None):
        self.spark = spark
        self.logger = None
        
        self.trans_primitives = ["weekday", "day", "multiply_numeric", "add_numeric", "subtract_numeric", 
                                 "month", "natural_logarithm", "week", "year", 
                                 "square_root", "is_weekend"]
        
        self.agg_primitives = ["sum", "std", "max", "skew", "min", "mean", "count", "mode", "num_unique", 
                               "percent_true"]
        
        if logger:
            self.logger=logger
    

[docs]    def execute(self, dataframe, index_colum, trans_primitives=None, agg_primitives=None):
        """This method perform automated feature engineering on given spark dataframe

        Args:
            dataframe (pyspark.sql.DataFrame): _description_
            index_colum (str): name of index column
            trans_primitives (list, optional): List of Aggregation Feature types to apply. Defaults to None.
            agg_primitives (list, optional): List of Transform Feature functions to apply. Defaults to None.

        Returns:
            pyspark.sql.DataFrame: generated feature matrix
        """
        if trans_primitives != "default":
            self.trans_primitives = trans_primitives
        if not trans_primitives:
            self.trans_primitives = None
            
        if agg_primitives != "default":
            self.agg_primitives = agg_primitives
        if not agg_primitives:
            self.agg_primitives = None
            
        
        if self.logger:
            self.logger.info(f"trans_primitives:\n {self.trans_primitives}")
            
        if self.logger:
            self.logger.info(f"agg_primitives:\n {self.agg_primitives}")

        # broadcast primitives, source columns, index column
        broadcasted_trans_primitives = self.spark.sparkContext.broadcast(self.trans_primitives)
        broadcasted_agg_primitives = self.spark.sparkContext.broadcast(self.agg_primitives)
        broadcasted_source_column = self.spark.sparkContext.broadcast(dataframe.columns)
        broadcasted_index_colum = self.spark.sparkContext.broadcast(index_colum)

        # create featuretools features
        def createFeatureToolsFeatures(partitionData):
            import pandas as pd
            import featuretools as ft
            import warnings
            warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")
            columnNames = broadcasted_source_column.value
            partitionData = pd.DataFrame(partitionData, columns=columnNames)
            es = ft.EntitySet(id="customer360")
            logic_types = {}
            for key in list(partitionData.columns):
                if key.startswith("i_"):
                    logic_types[key] = "Integer"
                if key.startswith("s_"):
                    logic_types[key] = "Categorical"
                if key.startswith("f_"):
                    logic_types[key] = "Double"
                if key.startswith("d_"):
                    logic_types[key] = "Datetime"

            es = es.add_dataframe(
                dataframe_name="customer360",
                dataframe=partitionData,
                index=broadcasted_index_colum.value,
                logical_types=logic_types
            )
            feature_matrix, feature_defs = ft.dfs(entityset=es, 
                                                  target_dataframe_name="customer360", 
                                                  trans_primitives=broadcasted_trans_primitives.value, 
                                                  agg_primitives=broadcasted_agg_primitives.value)
            feature_matrix.reset_index(inplace=True)
            dd_dtypes  = feature_matrix.dtypes.apply(lambda x: x.name).to_dict()
            for key in dd_dtypes:
                if "boolean" in dd_dtypes[key]:
                    dd_dtypes[key] = "object"
                elif "category" in dd_dtypes[key] and ("MONTH" in dd_dtypes[key] or "WEEKDAY" in dd_dtypes[key] or "DAY" in dd_dtypes[key] or "YEAR" in dd_dtypes[key] or "WEEK" in dd_dtypes[key]):
                    dd_dtypes[key] = "int32"
                elif "category" in dd_dtypes[key]:
                    dd_dtypes[key] = "object"
                elif "string" in dd_dtypes[key]:
                    dd_dtypes[key] = "object"
            feature_matrix = feature_matrix.astype(dd_dtypes)
            feature_matrix = feature_matrix.to_dict("index")
            result = []
            for key in feature_matrix:
                result.append(feature_matrix[key])
            return iter(result)
        
        
        resultDF = dataframe.rdd.mapPartitions(createFeatureToolsFeatures)
        
        # Convert rdd to dataframe
        resultDF = self.spark.createDataFrame(resultDF)
        
        return resultDF
